Crises in Ecuador, Haiti could fuel migration in 2024, report saysThousands more people could be forced to leave Ecuador and Haiti in 2024 due to humanitarian crises such as intensifying violence, climate impacts and deepening poverty, the International Rescue Committee said in a report on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 18:01:54 GMT BUMIH3AS4JO7LKPDTVLZKTTI4I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/crises-ecuador-haiti-could-fuel-migration-2024-report-says-2024-02-14/Kylie Madry世界美洲
Netanyahu is pursuing war 'for his personal career', Palestinian FM saysPalestinian Foreign Minister Riyad al-Maliki accused Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday of caring only about his political survival as attempts to end the conflict in Gaza appeared inconclusive. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 17:38:38 GMT JD5DXOZNKFIZRGDNNPVIW44QKGM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-is-pursuing-war-for-his-personal-career-palestinian-fm-says-2024-02-14/Reuters世界中东
Russian missile hits apartments in Kharkiv region, killing two - policeA Russian missile struck an apartment block in a village in Ukraine's northern Kharkiv region on Wednesday, killing two people and wounding at least four, police said, adding that four others might be buried under the rubble. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 17:20:11 GMT JKJOMTFS4ZOG7A3URZRPLCCAMJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-missile-hits-apartments-kharkiv-region-killing-two-police-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Pope urges Catholics to swap social media for reflection as Lent beginsPope Francis urged Catholics to forgo worldly trappings and focus on essentials as he opened the season of Lent with a traditional Ash Wednesday Mass on one of Rome's historic seven hills. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:58:46 GMT 7J3L2ZKVORMGVPX6ZFBBAKEYXE https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/pope-urges-catholics-swap-social-media-reflection-lent-begins-2024-02-14/Reuters生活方式
UN fears US designation of Houthis could harm Yemen's economyThe United Nations fears that a U.S. decision to return Yemen's Houthi rebels to a list of terrorist groups could harm the war-torn country's economy, particularly commercial imports of essential items, a senior U.N. aid official said on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:53:25 GMT COCYLXLUVZJM7L2AYYEFGBZMV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/un-fears-us-designation-houthis-could-harm-yemens-economy-2024-02-14/Michelle Nichols世界
Putin says Russia is close to creating cancer vaccinesPresident Vladimir Putin said on Wednesday that Russian scientists were close to creating vaccines for cancer that could soon be available to patients. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:44:03 GMT DBJUO637WFPTVO3WO6EVQPLNT4 https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/putin-says-Russia-is-close-creating-cancer-vaccines-2024-02-14/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Czech parliament group recommends dropping part of company transformations billA Czech parliamentary committee on Wednesday recommended dropping contested passages of a proposed bill that critics say would make it easier for the government to fully take over parts of power utility CEZ , a ruling party lawmaker said. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:30:44 GMT LYEV7C7UGJLXHGRJJUEEHXZ6XA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/czech-parliament-group-recommends-dropping-part-company-transformations-bill-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
India's Modi opens Hindu temple in Muslim UAE as election nearsIndian Prime Minister Narendra Modi opened a grand Hindu temple in the United Arab Emirates on Wednesday, capping off a two-day visit to the Muslim nation that is home to around 3.5 million Indians. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:11:00 GMT 2CA7WH6XRZL4VBG6CRETAPI2ZE https://www.reuters.com/world/indias-modi-opens-hindu-temple-muslim-uae-election-nears-2024-02-14/Alexander Cornwell世界
Neutral Swiss to beef up military spending in wake of Ukraine warThe government of neutral Switzerland said on Wednesday it would be ramping up military spending over the coming years, the latest European country to do so in the wake of Russia's invasion of Ukraine two years ago. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 16:04:56 GMT 2ZTXE3YRRRO7LAPO2ACIH6YYBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/neutral-swiss-beef-up-military-spending-wake-ukraine-war-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Pope Francis urged to offer financial support for abused nunsPope Francis needs to set up a fund for nuns who quit religious life after abuse from priests and prelates, activists say, calling for greater attention on a long-neglected issue in the Catholic Church. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 15:21:17 GMT JMB3HNE2TZPXZG2J4K6CU4UHL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-urged-offer-financial-support-abused-nuns-2024-02-14/Alvise Armellini世界欧洲
NATO's Stoltenberg urges US House to pass Ukraine aid, says China watchingNATO boss Jens Stoltenberg urged the U.S. House of Representatives on Wednesday to pass a "vital" multi-billion dollar military aid package for Ukraine, telling lawmakers that China would be emboldened if Russia wins its war. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 14:58:47 GMT GX2QTRDS3NJ47KG6CG67J6Q72E https://www.reuters.com/world/natos-stoltenberg-urges-us-house-pass-ukraine-aid-says-china-watching-2024-02-14/Andrew Gray, Johnny Cotton世界
